title: The HARD MODE of PC building - Cooler Master QUBE 500
description: Play Enlisted for FREE on PC, Xbox Series X|S and PS5:  Follow the link to download the game and get your exclusive bonus now. See you in battle!  PC building can be challenging, but Cooler Master wants to give you the chance to prove your grit with their new QUBE 500 flatpack case that makes you build the case while building your PC. Will Adam have the skills and assemble everything correctly the first time? Find out on today's episode of ShortCircuit!  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Is your life TOO EASY? 0:42 Different build options and the confusing instruction booklet 1:50 Mounting the motherboard and PSU 4:36 Does this save shipping costs? 5:14 Front panel and concerning mesh filter 7:03 Sponsor - Enlisted 7:26 Bottom and top panels 9:11 Feet and harddrive mounting 9:35 Integrated handle and cable management space 10:33 Side panels and additional radiator mounting 11:48 Additional Maracon edition colours and accessories 12:24 Thoughts on the building experience, thermal potential, and sustainability 14:08 Pricing and final thoughts 15:24 Outro
